means: 想( think的过去式和过去分词)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"思想，观点，观念"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: idea, concept, conception, thought, notion, impression
means: idea ： 最普通常用词，几乎适用于任何方面的思维活动。
concept ： 指从众多实例中通过概括、归纳而形成的对事物本质、全貌及其内部联系的概念或看法。
conception ： 通常指个人或一些人所持有的具体概念或念头，也可指概念的形成过程，含一定的想象和感情色彩意味。
thought ： 指以推理、思考等智力活动为基础的心理思维活动及其结果。
notion ： 指的是一种模糊的，变化的莫测的想法，无可靠的基础，未经深思熟虑的观点。
impression ： 指外部刺激在思想中所产生的印象。

sentence.Network_en: I thought I'd enrol you with an art group at the school.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想我会吸收你参加学校的一个艺术团。

sentence.Network_en: I thought you might like to read the enclosed.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想你或许想要读一下信封里的内容。

sentence.Network_en: "Wait there!" Kathryn rose. "No, on second thought, follow me."
sentence.Network_cn: “在那儿等着！”凯瑟琳站起身来，“不，我改主意了。跟我来。”

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to tell someone not to worry when they have apologized for something
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)（对已道歉之事）别再想了，忘了它吧

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to indicate that it is the kindness behind an act that matters, however imperfect or insignificant the act may be
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)情意（或心意）更为重要

lj.lj_ly: not one of them &B{gave a second thought to} the risks involved.
lj.lj_ls: 他们中没有一个人对所涉及的危险做进一步考虑。

lj.lj_ly: those of us who work at home may find our hands a thought freer.
lj.lj_ls: 我们中那些在家工作的人可能发现手头稍稍闲了些。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to express approval of a comment or suggestion

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thōht, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch gedachte, also to think

entry.def: Thought is the past tense and past participle of think .
A thought is an idea that you have in your mind.

example.ex: The thought of Nick made her throat tighten...
example.tran: 一想到尼克，她的喉咙就发紧。

example.ex: I tormented myself with the thought that life was just too comfortable...
example.tran: 一想到生活太过舒适了，我内心就很痛苦。

entry.def: A person's thoughts are their mind, or all the ideas in their mind when they are concentrating on one particular thing.

example.ex: I jumped to my feet so my thoughts wouldn't start to wander...
Usually at this time our thoughts are on Christmas...
example.tran: 通常在这种时候，我们的心思全放在了圣诞节上。

entry.def: A person's thoughts are their opinions on a particular subject.

example.ex: Many of you have written to us to express your thoughts on the conflict...
example.tran: 你们中有许多人给我们来信，表达对冲突的看法。

example.ex: Mr Goodman, do you have any thoughts on that?
example.tran: 古德曼先生，那个问题你怎么看？

entry.def: Thought is the activity of thinking, especially deeply, carefully, or logically.

example.ex: Alice had been so deep in thought that she had walked past her car without even seeing it...
example.tran: 艾丽斯考虑问题入了神，连走过自己的车都没看见。

example.ex: He had given some thought to what she had told him...
example.tran: 他认真考虑了她对他说过的话。

entry.def: A thought is an intention, hope, or reason for doing something.

example.ex: Sarah's first thought was to run back and get Max...
example.tran: 萨拉首先想到的就是跑回去把马克斯叫来。

example.ex: They had no thought of surrender...

entry.tran: 关心，善意，帮助(尤用于感谢或表达钦佩之情)
entry.def: A thought is an act of kindness or an offer of help; used especially when you are thanking someone, or expressing admiration of someone.

example.ex: 'Would you like to move into the ward?' — 'A kind thought, but no, thank you.'
example.tran: “你想不想挪到病房里来？”——“哦，您太好心了，不用了，谢谢。”

example.ex: 'She has given them this seven hundred pounds.' — 'What a lovely thought.'
example.tran: “她给了他们这 700 英镑。”——“太慷慨了。”

entry.tran: (宗教、哲学、科学、政党等的)思想体系，观念体系
entry.def: Thought is the group of ideas and beliefs which belongs, for example, to a particular religion, philosophy, science, or political party.

example.ex: Aristotle's scientific theories dominated Western thought for fifteen hundred years...
example.tran: 亚里士多德的科学理论统治了西方思想达 1,500 年。

example.ex: This school of thought argues that depression is best treated by drugs.
example.tran: 这一学派主张抑郁症最好用药物治疗。

means.word_mean: 1. the content of cognition; the main thing you are thinking about;
2. the process of thinking (especially thinking carefully);
3. the organized beliefs of a period or group or individual;
4. a personal belief or judgment that is not founded on proof or certainty;

auth_sentence.content: I thought my back would break many a time.
auth_sentence.res_content: I thought my back would break many a time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I thought my back would break many a time.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, maybe things we once thought were unbearable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, maybe things we once thought were unbearable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, maybe things we once thought were unbearable.

auth_sentence.content: However, it is not thought to be suspicious.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, it is not thought to be suspicious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, it is not thought to be suspicious.

Sentence.sentence: The thought of having no sleep for 24 hours or more isn't a pleasant one for most people.
Few doctors would have thought that there might be an exception to this
Financiers who were not as clever as they thought they were?
He thought it would help enhance Harvard's reputation.
He thought it represented the will of the Harvard community
They are thought to be the only insect that does this.

means.word_mean: 思索, 思维能力; 思考的过程

sentences.en: After some thought he hit on a plan to route the enemy.
sentences.cn: 他经过一番思考, 想到了一个打垮敌人的办法。

sentences.en: His thought is beyond the reach of my imagination.
sentences.cn: 他的思想不是我所能想像得到的。

means.word_mean: 关心, 注意, 考虑

sentences.en: The nurse is always full of thought for her patients.
sentences.cn: 这名护士对病人总是关心备至。

sentences.en: Why do you hide your thoughts from me?
sentences.cn: 你为什么对我隐瞒你的想法?

sentences.en: She had no thought of going.

jushi.english: He was well-read in all these schools of thought current at the time.
jushi.chinese: 他对当时各思想流派的书是读得很多的。

jushi.english: This thought filled me with pleasure.
jushi.chinese: 这种想法使我心里充满喜悦。
